attributes.action: Unjust dismissal of pothole damage claims by your local council
attributes.additional_details: The particular road had many potholes, some severe, for many months and the incident happened on a rainy day when the potholes were full of water, so hidden. The vehicle was barely drivable and a tyre centre stated that the steering had been damaged. Relevant photographs and a claim form were sent to Buckinghamshire County Council. Incident date: 30/05/2018, location: Deep Mill Lane, Little Kingshill.
attributes.background: Unjust dismissal of vehicular damage claim, caused by lack of road maintenance by County Council.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
